attributes.action: Make it less easy for local authorities (childrens services) to take children away from innocent families
attributes.additional_details:
it should be passed by government that the public and or the media be allowed into what has been termed as "secret family courts"  by doing so more attention may be brought to the thousands of families that have been unfairly split up . Social worker's have to much power over citizens lives and use it to their advantage this needs to needs to be addressed sooner rather than later.
In the UK , you are innocent until proven guilty , but as far as local authorities are concerned , you are a Liar from the outset . Surely this demands intervention by government .
